articles.title: Post Malone, Melanie Martinez, more
articles.description: Get tickets for Post Malone at Chase Center in San Francisco, Melanie Martinez at Fox Theater in Oakland, Ana Gabriel at Oakland Arena, more concerts.
articles.content:
Here are the top concerts of the week (March 19-25):
Post Malone
He’s one of the hottest artists in the entire music business, having topped the overall Billboard 200 with his last two albums – 2018’s “Beerbongs and Bentleys” and 2019’s “Hollywood’s ... [1874 chars]

articles.title: Christian Domínguez
articles.description: Domínguez tiene otra hija con su exesposa Melanie Martínez y además un hijo que tuvo con Karla Tarazona
articles.content: La hija mayor de Christian Domínguez se mostró emocionada por la llegada de su hermanita, María Cataleya, quien nació este 4 de marzo en una clínica local. Como se sabe, con la llegada de la bebé, el cumbiambero se convierte en padres de tres menores... [667 chars]

articles.title: 20 Questions With Melanie Martinez: Her ‘After School’ EP, Love for Fiona Apple & What Fans Can Expect Next
articles.description: Melanie Martinez answered 20 Questions about the beginnings of her artistry, how she looks back on K-12 one year after its release, and more.
articles.content: 1. What’s the first piece of music that you bought for yourself, and what was the medium? When I was 16, I bought a record player and a bunch of vinyl with my own money. Some of those records were by CocoRosie, Neutral Milk Hotel, Patsy Cline and Fle... [6811 chars]

articles.title: Travis Scott, Jennifer Lopez and More Top Songs of the Week
articles.description: Travis Scott with Young Thug, Jennifer Lopez with Maluma, Melanie Martinez and more are in our "Fri 5" Top Songs of the Week.
articles.content: On a week like this, with a crushing onslaught of strong contenders for the coveted Fri 5, your faithful reviewer feels like an “American Idol” judge, with a whole load of self-imposed rules about what constitutes a great single (as opposed to a grea... [2945 chars]

articles.title: Melanie Martinez lança EP de inéditas e videoclipe do single 'The Bakery'
articles.description: Com sete faixas, 'After School' chegou às plataformas digitais nesta sexta (25) e acabou com a ansiedade dos fãs; leia mais
articles.content:
Melanie Martinez lança EP de inéditas e videoclipe do single 'The Bakery'
Com sete faixas, 'After School' chegou às plataformas digitais nesta sexta (25) e acabou com a ansiedade dos fãs
